name: We'll be gone with the wind
description:
From collection : Lost Times 
(portrait of Forugh Farrokhzad)

(Special piece for women international day)

And this is me
A lonely woman
On the eve of the cold season
At the beginning of understanding the contaminated existence of the earth
And the simple and sad despair of the sky
And the inability of these concrete hands
The time passed
Time passed and the clock played four times
It played four times
Today is the first day of December
I know the secret of the seasons
And I understand the words of the moments
The savior is asleep in the grave
And soil, acceptor soil
It is a sign of calm
… 
Forugh Farrokhzad (1934 –1967) 
She was an influential Iranian poet and film director. She was a controversial modernist poet and an iconoclast, writing from a female point of view.
